definition: to ignite/to light a fire/to agitate/to start an engine/ignition/fig. to stir up trouble

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
surname Huo
ignition switch

sentences.english: These ignition wires send the charge to each spark plug.
sentences.chinese: 這些點火導線將電荷運送至每個火花塞。

sentences.english: The survey principle of a magneto ignition system ignition advance angle was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了磁電機點火系統的點火提前角測量原理。

sentences.english: The survey principle of a magneto ignition system ignition advance angle was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了磁電機點火系統的點火提前角測量原理。

sentences.english: The performance is optimized by using a pyrotechnic igniter as described in the Igniter web page.
sentences.chinese: 性能優化，使用煙火點火器中所述的引爆器的網頁。

sentences.english: A fire could be lit under the vat in winter to stop the water from freezing.
sentences.chinese: 在大缸下面是可以點火的爲了防止水冬天結冰。

sentences.english: Preventive measures in industry include inerting and elimination of ignition sources.
sentences.chinese: 工業預防措施包括惰化和消除點火源。

sentences.english: This system can be extended to realize the multi-center data acquisition, and the measurement of many-headed ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 將此係統進行擴展可實現多頭點火線圈的測試。

sentences.english: An expendable jet perforating gun with large horizontal firing charges.
sentences.chinese: 帶有水平點火大射孔彈的消毀式聚能射孔槍。

sentences.english: A new ignition system where a two layered centre core ignition system having a pyrotechnic composition is given.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種帶煙火劑雙層中心點火管的新型點火系統。

sentences.english: A new ignition system where a two layered centre core ignition system having a pyrotechnic composition is given.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種帶煙火劑雙層中心點火管的新型點火系統。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is easily ignited by heat, open flames, electrical sparks, and static electricity.
sentences.chinese: 電系統爲點火，喇叭，燈光，發熱器和起動器提供電。

sentences.english: Place ignition switch into openings on steering column.
sentences.chinese: 放置點火開關至打開的轉向柱上。

sentences.english: Kurt watched the Pelicans fire their jets and scorch the grass.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾特看着鵜鶘運兵船點火，它們的噴焰把草燒焦。

sentences.english: Above, an artist's conception of the Space Launch System blasting off.
sentences.chinese: 圖中，藝術家設想的太空發射系統點火升空了。

sentences.english: Disconnect the secondary spark plug cable from the ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 從點火線圈上拆下輔助火星塞電纜。

sentences.english: I will prepare the other bull and put it on the wood but not set fire to it.
sentences.chinese: 我也預備一隻牛犢放在柴上，也不點火。

at the scene/on the spot

to turn sth around/to swivel
